result.title: Baby Step Giant Step Algorithm and a Conversation
result.content:
Hi everyone! After reading about baby step giant step algorithm on Wikipedia, I became little bit confused and some questions came a cross on my mind. Then, I passed my next 7 days by searching on google to get my answers about BSGS. But I didn't find anything helpful. After that, I wrote a post on our CSE department's facebook group about my questions and had a conversation with my senior brother of CSE department Shakil vai about my those questions and got my desired answers. Now, I'm going to upload those screenshots in here. It can be helpful to others.

Happy Coding everyone! :)
